magikarp.name: Magikarp
magikarp.description: Magikarp is a pathetic excuse for a Pokémon that is only capable of flopping and splashing. This behavior prompted scientists to undertake research into it.

pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.description: It lives in forests with others. It stores electricity in the pouches on its cheeks.

mudkip.name: Mudkip
mudkip.description: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to lift boulders.

grovyle.name: Grovyle
grovyle.description: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.

ampharos.name: Ampharos
ampharos.description: The bright light on its tail can be seen far away. It has been treasured since ancient times as a beacon.

blastoise.name: Blastoise
blastoise.description: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.

wailord.name: Wailord
wailord.description: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.

snorlax.name: Snorlax
snorlax.description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

garchomp.name: Garchomp
garchomp.description: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.

jirachi.name: Jirachi
jirachi.description: Once Jeffrey got iron head-flinched 5 times in a row: “skill diff”

hooh.name: Ho-oh
hooh.description: It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted trainer by shining its bright rainbow-colored wings.

megalopunny.name: Mega Lopunny
megalopunny.description: When this card is summoned, you can target one opponent monster on the field; deal 100 damage to it, and if you do, it is silenced until the end of your turn.
